channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: James Carville: How to Turn Trump’s Economic Chaos Against Him
item.description: Tie the president to the people’s pain, and make the message local.

item.title: A Small City That Lost Big in the Dominican Nightclub Tragedy
item.description: Haina, a city just outside the Dominican capital, lost 25 people in the Jet Set disaster, including community leaders and cultural icons.

item.title: Trump’s senior crypto advisor donated $1M in campaign advertisements to top Trump Super PAC one week before election
item.description: Bo Hines also served as the CEO of an “anti-woke,” Gen Z-focused digital news platform that partnered with a Trump-affiliated memecoin.

item.title: Inside the crypto industry’s Faustian bargain with President Trump
item.description: 29-year-old Bo Hines is leading crypto policy at the White House. But will economic volatility upend the sector’s progress?

item.title: The Former C.I.A. Officer Capitalizing On Europe’s Military Spending Boom
item.description: Eric Slesinger made a career shift from the spy agency to venture capital, championing military start-ups as Europe beefed up its defenses amid an unc...

item.title: UK Laws Are Not ‘Fit for Social Media Age,’ Says Report Into Summer Riots
item.description: Outdated legislation prevented the police from rapidly correcting misinformation after a stabbing attack on a Taylor Swift-themed dance class last sum...

item.title: Chinese President Xi Jinping kickstarts his 3-nation Southeast Asia tour as Trump flip-flops on tariffs
item.description: Xi arrived in Vietnam on Monday, and will visit Malaysia and Cambodia later this week. His visit comes just days after Trump put a 90-day pause on rec...

item.title: Cutting complexity might be the new leadership superpower
item.description: CEOs are confronting complexity and organizational bloat. Here's how.

item.title: Donald Trump’s 29-year-old crypto guru lays out the president’s plans for regulating crypto and rolling back a Biden-era crackdown
item.description: Since his appointment, Bo Hines has become a mini-celebrity in the crypto world—with CEOs, billionaire investors, and lobbyists vying for face time.

item.title: How to Evade Taxes in Ancient Rome? A 1,900-Year-Old Papyrus Offers a Guide.
item.description: A manuscript discovered in the Judean desert contains trial notes on an intricate tax-evasion scheme that involved forgery, fiscal fraud and the false...

item.title: In Ukraine, Porn Is Illegal. So Why Are Its Creators Paying Taxes?
item.description: Ukraine makes tax revenue off the creators of pornographic content, but also threatens them with prosecution. A draft law aims to fix what many say is...
